job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Senior Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving AI tools for customer support, rather than developing or engineering AI models or systems. The core responsibilities involve analyzing tickets, providing feedback on AI solutions, and prototyping new AI tools, which aligns more with the use of AI for productivity enhancement rather than core AI development. There is no evidence of core ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer tasks such as algorithm development, model training, RAG system building, or fine-tuning LLMs in a development capacity. The role is primarily technical support with an AI augmentation component.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer issues and how AI systems are used to resolve them, implying a need to grasp the business context of customer support.
The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving AI models, even if the primary role is not building them from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' suggests development and integration activities, albeit at a prototyping level.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: Improving the AI system by providing feedback on AI-generated solutions and participating in fine-tuning sessions can be seen as a form of operational improvement and maintenance of AI systems in a support context.
Reviewing AI-generated solutions and providing feedback is part of the operational loop to ensure AI performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
